Install

After cloning this repository:

pip install -e .

How to use

Playing cards in python!

{% raw %} 
from deck_of_cards.deck import Deck
d = Deck()
print(f'Number of playing cards in the deck: {len(d.cards)}')

Number of playing cards in the deck: 52
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
card = d.pop_card()
print(card)

Queen of Spades
{% endraw %}
